changeSet.author: MineStar
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CYCLE SET ENDSINKLOCATION = SINKLOCATION, ENDSINKLOCATIONNAME = SINKLOCATIONNAME WHERE ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.Cycle.ProductionCycle.LoadHaulDumpCycle'

rollback.sql: UPDATE CYCLE SET SINKLOCATION = ENDSINKLOCATION, SINKLOCATIONNAME = ENDSINKLOCATIONNAME WHERE ECF_CLASS_ID = 'XAEntity.Cycle.ProductionCycle.LoadHaulDumpCycle'
